item.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Data Packs
item.description: [!quote] From the Minecraft Wiki: The data pack system provides a way for players to further customize their Minecraft experience.

item.title: üè∑Ô∏è Tags
item.description: Tags are Minecraft’s way of categorizing various features of the game. This list will not include any Vanilla Minecraft tags.

item.title: üßπ Custom Witch Quests & Rewards
item.description: With data packs you can modify both the requested items and the rewards from Witch Quests. Requested Items Items required for quests come from a “category”.
